Hi  can I check if it’s always the case that citi pay all willRun some promo before may income tax payment cycle kick start? New to this.. and like to try using Citi pay all ..but not sure if should wait tillPromotional period or should I just sign…Also  assuming I choose to pay by 12 month instalment  few months later  they runs a promo. Can I use Citi pay all for the remaining months installment? Thanks in advance 🙏🏾
Do you plan to use Citi payall to pay income tax n other expenses n exceed $8k? Citi payall promo usually has minimum total $8k spend requirements. Or else you won’t get promo.
Always go for income tax instalment.Yes. U can always pay off early your future installments. But don’t overpay until credit balance overall.

Hi guys. Qn about the DBS womens world card.We just rcvd our card and had encountered some issues trying to pair it to some apps (like lazada). It keeps getting declined  saying the bank has declined the transaction.My husb tried buying a game off Steam and it was declined too.Called the bank and they said some websites and apps are flagged due to high fraudulent activities so whenever such transactions are declined  we need to call the bank to ask them to allow the transaction to go through.Seems like alot of work to be using this card..Is this something you guys encountered too? 🤔
